trans-unit.source: Implement and attach to a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> object to control how the importer maps Web Services Description Language (WSDL) parts to those of a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object.

Implement the IWsdlImportExtension interface to control the mapping between WSDL and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects, especially when reading custom WSDL extensions to modify your contract or endpoint information.
Then attach your custom IWsdlImportExtension object to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> either programmatically or by using an application configuration file.

You can also attach your custom IWsdlImportExtension object to the internal <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> used by the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) using an application configuration file.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> method is called to import a contract.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A> method to modify the metadata that is then imported into <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects.
Called prior to importing metadata documents.
The BeforeImport methods of all registered <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> objects is called before anything is imported from the supplied metadata.
The service descriptions to modify.
The schema collection to be used when importing.
The policy assertions used when importing.
Called when importing a contract.
The ImportContract method is called when a contract is being imported.

You can modify the contract or insert other exporting behaviors such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> and an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> objects to modify the code that is generated for the contract.
The importer.
The import context to be modified.
Called when importing an endpoint.
The ImportEndpoint method is called when importing an endpoint.
Modify the context properties to customize the imported endpoint.
The importer.
The import context to modify.
